message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the money devalues quickly for you. This gives us both a good deal right now.
Alice, your initial offer was tempting, but it's my turn now. Let's be realistic. This offer ensures I'm not losing out too much from the devaluation.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.  Every round that passes hurts you more than it hurts me.
